at the beginning of each player's upkeep cardname deals n damage to them
at the beginning of each player's end step cardname deals n damage to that player unless one of their opponents was dealt damage this turn
at the beginning of each player's upkeep cardname deals n damage to that player
at the beginning of your end step cardname deals n damage to each planeswalker
at the beginning of your end step cardname deals n damage to enchanted artifact's controller
cardname deals n damage to target creature
cardname deals n damage to any target
cardname deals n damage to each opponent
cardname deals n damage to each player
cardname deals n damage to target creature that was dealt damage this turn
cardname deals n damage to any target that was dealt damage this turn
